org.springframework.data.convert

接口 ConverterBuilder.ConverterAware

  • 所有超级接口:
    ConverterBuilder, ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterAware, ConverterBuilder.WritingConverterAware
    封闭接口:
    ConverterBuilder

    public static interface ConverterBuilder.ConverterAware
extends ConverterBuilder, ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterAware, ConverterBuilder.WritingConverterAware
    A ConverterBuilder aware of both a reading and writing converter.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
